title: Emerald Radiance Nakshi Haaram - A Timeless Treasure
features: This exquisite Haaram features a contemporary design inspired by traditional South Indian artistry. The centerpiece showcases oval-cut emeralds, meticulously framed by dazzling CZ diamonds in a pave setting. Delicate golden bead dangles add a touch of traditional elegance. The Haaram incorporates intricate filigree work, reminiscent of traditional nakshi craftsmanship, creating a visually stunning piece.
occasions: and grand celebrations. A perfect statement piece for muhurtham
or any special occasion where you want to exude elegance and grace.
description: This Haaram is a harmonious blend of traditional South Indian design and modern aesthetics. The high-quality emeralds and CZ diamonds radiate brilliance, while the Hyderabadi polish on the gold ensures a lasting luster. The intricate craftsmanship and symbolic value make it a treasured heirloom to be passed down through generations. The combination of emeralds and gold is considered auspicious in South Indian culture, representing prosperity and good fortune.
